name: The Guardian With No Past
description:
This game is my entry for the Pizza Jam 2019 (March 2019).

Theme

"Make a game based on the name of one of these level sequences"

http://info.sonicretro.org/List_of_Shadow_the_Hedgehog_Library_sequences

I chose "The Guardian With No Past".

Description

"You've hear rumors about an ancient temple in a cave that holds a legendary treasure that allows peoples to time travel.
But you've been told that no one comes alive from this cave...
You decided to check by yourself and get that treasure !
But what you'll see is far worth than death..."

Fight the Guardian With No Past and get the treasure !

Controls

  • Move : WASD or Arrows Keys
  • Camera : Mouse
  • Shoot : Left click
  • Jump : Space
  • Menu/Quit : Escape

Things used

  • Engine : Unity
  • Sounds : Gun
  • Music : Kevin MacLeod - Heartbeat
  • Textures : Asphalt, White Marble, Wood Tiles, Rough Rock, Metal
  • Shader (for some textures) : Procedural Stochastic Texturing
  • Fonts : Iceberg
